summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 2.1°C) and drier conditions in rainfall (down 0.6 mm).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 1460 m), light levels (up 8597 lux), feels like temperature (up 4.0°C), and outside temperature (up 3.4°C) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s average cloud levels is 14.3m higher than yesterday, 842.7m lower than the past week, 1460.0m lower than the past month.

Yesterday, cloud levels hit a low of 765m and a high of 2220m, averaging 1280.0m; the past week and month reported somewhat higher averages.
cloud levels.summary: Expect mostly clear skies with high cloud.

summary.summary: Inside; a mild and comfortable temperature is anticipated. Outside; the temperature will feel nicely warm and pleasant. Also, neither too dry nor too humid. Chance of light rain, mostly clear skies with high cloud, and moderate levels of sunlight will be present. Low pressure may lead to stormy or rainy weather.
